channel.title: Red Bull Canimation
channel.description:
I thought I would share this with you, I've entered a stop motion animation into the "Red Bull Canimation" competition.
Also every like, comment, share etc counts as a vote so it'd help if you sent it to other people too (if you like it :wink: )
I'd like to know what you think so please comment on the video and tell me!
[url]https://canimation.redbull.co.uk/gallery#32168690[/url]
thanks

item.title: Red Bull Canimation
item.dc:creator: DeadlyFox
item.description:
sersoft:

voted for https://canimation.redbull.co.uk/gallery#31578999 that one

The animation isn’t that great but it’s certainly the best recycling I’ve seen.

item.title: Red Bull Canimation
item.dc:creator: DeadlyFox
item.description:
Ah, thanks for that. I haven’t posted in a while and didn’t realise, been lurking/only checking back just occasionally for too long.

I’ll just repost it there and this thread can be ignored/deleted.

item.title: Red Bull Canimation
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
That’s pretty good stop-motion animation; very smooth. For future reference, we have a “Show Off” forum where people are more likely to expect this kind of stuff.

Read full topic
